context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: explore several options including: apply for financial aid or grants from pharmaceutical companies or non-profit organizations that assist with medical bills, exploring cheaper alternatives or generic versions of the medication, discussing with the doctor for more affordable treatment options, contacting the hospital's financial assistance department, or even setting up a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds for her treatment
explore all possible alternatives
research all possible avenues for assistance
seek assistance from charities or nonprofit organizations that help with medical expenses

try to negotiate with the pharmacy or drug manufacturer for a lower price, seek financial assistance from nonprofit organizations or charities, look into clinical trials or alternative treatments, apply for patient assistance programs or crowdfunding, and explore generic or cheaper alternatives for the medication
reach out to local health agencies, charities, or non-profit organizations that assist with medical expenses
explore all the possible options available
explore various options such as reaching out to charities, non-profit organizations, or pharmaceutical assistance programs that might be able to help fund the medication
explore different options to help cover the cost of the medication
explore different options

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride service to immediately transport him to the airport
call a taxi, uber, or any other ride service to get to the airport as quickly as possible while arranging for his car to be towed or serviced later
call a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi, an Uber, or a roadside assistance service to either fix his car or get him to the airport ASAP
immediately call for a taxi or a ride-hailing service, like Uber or Lyft, while simultaneously contacting a towing service to manage his broken down car
call a cab, an Uber, or a friend to quickly pick him up and take him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck, and while waiting for help, he could also call a taxi, ride share service, or a friend to get him to the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service available
call a cab, uber, or a friend to take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any other kind of ride service to get to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or owner
check the sales records for the day to ensure that all transactions were accounted for
conduct an audit of the day's transactions to pinpoint where the accounting error occurred
immediately notify his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money
check the security camera footage to see if there was any suspicious activity or if a mistake was made during a transaction that could have led to the missing money
check the surveillance cameras if there are any, to see if there has been any theft or pricing error
carefully recount the money in the register to ensure no mistakes were made
report the missing money to his supervisor or boss immediately and explain the situation
check the security camera footage to see if there was any theft
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery immediately, and honestly explain the situation

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put where they are, conserve their resources, and make themselves as visible as possible for rescuers
start rationing the remaining food and water they have to make it last longer
try and find shelter to protect them from the cold and harsh weather conditions
stay put and build a shelter to keep them warm and protected from the elements
stay put and find a way to signal for help
stay in one place
stay put and create a shelter to protect him and his team from the cold
stay where he is and create a visible signal for rescuers to see
stay put and try to make a signal so the rescue crew can locate them
